original_text: From there we traveled to Philippi, a Roman colony and the leading city of that district of Macedonia. And we stayed there several days.
korean_text: 거기서 빌립보에 이르니 이는 마게도냐 지방의 첫 성이요 또 로마의 식민지라 이 성에서 수일을 유하다가

sentences.original_text: From there we traveled to Philippi
and leading city of that district of Macedonia
And we stayed there several days
